# VoluBind

[![modrinth](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=version&query=version_number&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/version/ZyBVqgqm&style=flat-square&)](https://modrinth.com/mod/volubind/version/1.0.0%2B1.19)
[![modrinth](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=downloads&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/kfEow3K7&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/volubind)

[![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/N4N4BWSFO)



A client-sided Fabric mod for 1.19 that allows you to create keybinds to control your in-game volume.
